kv7.1:1.1_0: Natthi keci dhammā kehici dhammehi saṅgahitāti?
kv7.1:1.3_0: Nanu atthi keci dhammā kehici dhammehi gaṇanaṁ gacchanti uddesaṁ gacchanti pariyāpannāti?
kv7.1:1.5_0: Hañci atthi keci dhammā kehici dhammehi gaṇanaṁ gacchanti uddesaṁ gacchanti pariyāpannā, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv7.1:2.3_0: Hañci cakkhāyatanaṁ rūpakkhandhagaṇanaṁ gacchati, tena vata re vattabbe—
kv7.1:2.10_0: Hañci kāyāyatanaṁ rūpakkhandhagaṇanaṁ gacchati, tena vata re vattabbe—
kv7.1:3.7_0: Hañci phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṁ rūpakkhandhagaṇanaṁ gacchati, tena vata re vattabbe—
kv7.1:4.3_0: Hañci sukhā vedanā vedanākkhandhagaṇanaṁ gacchati, tena vata re vattabbe—
kv7.1:4.5_0: Dukkhā vedanā …pe… adukkhamasukhā vedanā katamakkhandhagaṇanaṁ gacchatīti?
kv7.1:4.7_0: Hañci adukkhamasukhā vedanā vedanākkhandhagaṇanaṁ gacchati, tena vata re vattabbe—
kv7.1:5.3_0: Hañci cakkhusamphassajā saññā saññākkhandhagaṇanaṁ gacchati, tena vata re vattabbe—
kv7.1:5.8_0: Hañci manosamphassajā saññā saññākkhandhagaṇanaṁ gacchati, tena vata re vattabbe—
kv7.1:6.4_0: Hañci manosamphassajā cetanā saṅkhārakkhandhagaṇanaṁ gacchati, tena vata re vattabbe—
kv7.1:7.4_0: Hañci manoviññāṇaṁ viññāṇakkhandhagaṇanaṁ gacchati, tena vata re vattabbe—
kv7.1:8.1_0: Yathā dāmena vā yottena vā dve balībaddā saṅgahitā, sikkāya piṇḍapāto saṅgahito, sā gaddulena saṅgahito;
kv7.1:8.2_0: evameva te dhammā tehi dhammehi saṅgahitāti?
kv7.1:8.3_0: Hañci dāmena vā yottena vā dve balībaddā saṅgahitā, sikkāya piṇḍapāto saṅgahito, sā gaddulena saṅgahito, tena vata re vattabbe—
